fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the bug used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person investigating or fixing the bug, or verifying the fix

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this bug is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this bug will be fixed

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: Proposed = for triage; Active = approved, not yet fixed; Resolved = fix not yet verified; Closed = fix verified

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the bug is in the current state

fields.name: Resolved Reason
fields.description: The reason why the bug was resolved

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Business importance. 1=must fix; 4=unimportant.

fields.name: Triage
fields.description: Status of triaging the bug

fields.name: Severity
fields.description: Assessment of the effect of the bug on the project

fields.name: Stack Rank
fields.description: Work first on items with lower-valued stack rank. Set in triage.

fields.name: Discipline
fields.description: The discipline to which the bug belongs

fields.name: System Info
fields.description: Test context, provided automatically by test

fields.name: Repro Steps
fields.description: How to see the bug. End by contrasting expected with actual behavior.

fields.name: Found In
fields.description: The build in which the bug was found

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build in which the bug was fixed

fields.name: Size
fields.description: The size of work estimated for fixing the bug

fields.name: Original Estimate
fields.description: The original estimate of units of work required to fix this bug

fields.name: Remaining Work
fields.description: An estimate of the work remaining to complete the bug (in person hours)

fields.name: Completed Work
fields.description: The work that has been completed for this bug (in person hours)

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: The type should be set to Business primarily to represent customer-facing issues. Work to change the architecture should be added as a Requirement

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the epic

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the epic is released

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the epic more time critical

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implemented the epic

fields.name: Application Type
fields.description: The type of application on which to give feedback

fields.name: Application Start Information
fields.description: The path to execute the application

fields.name: Application Launch Instructions
fields.description: Instructions to launch the specified application

fields.name: Rating
fields.description: Overall rating provided as part of feedback response

fields.name: Analysis
fields.description: The analysis of the issue including root cause identification and potential solutions

fields.name: Escalate
fields.description: Used to flag an issue as critical

fields.name: Mitigation Triggers
fields.description: The mitigation triggers

fields.name: Probability
fields.description: A percentage indicating the estimated likelihood that the risk will occur

fields.name: Committed
fields.description: Has the requirement been committed?

fields.name: Purpose
fields.description: The purpose of the review

fields.name: Comments
fields.description: Comments for the review

fields.name: Minutes
fields.description: The minutes of the review meeting

fields.name: Meeting Type
fields.description: The type of the review meeting

fields.name: Called Date
fields.description: The date and time the review was called

fields.name: Called By
fields.description: The person who called the review

fields.name: Steps
fields.description: Steps required to perform the test

fields.name: Automated Test Name
fields.description: The name of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Storage
fields.description: The assembly containing the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Id
fields.description: The ID of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Type
fields.description: The type of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Test Suite Type
fields.description: Specifies the category of the test suite.

fields.name: Test Suite Audit
fields.description: Captures the test suite audit trail.

fields.name: Issue
fields.description: Used to highlight the shared step, e.g., to mark it as an issue.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this epic to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the epic

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this epic is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this epic will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the epic

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the epic is in its current state

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Priority for completing the epic, based on business goals

fields.name: Triage
fields.description: Status of triaging the epic

fields.name: Stack Rank
fields.description: Work first on items with lower-valued stack rank.

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the epic

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the epic is released

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the epic more time critical

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implemented the epic

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: Business = Customer-facing epics; Architectural = Technology initiatives to support current and future business needs

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build in which the epic was fixed

fields.name: Area Path

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the feature

fields.name: Business Value

fields.name: Time Criticality

fields.name: Effort

fields.description: Work first on items with lower-valued stack rank. Set in triage.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test case used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test case

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the test case is in the current state

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this test case

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Importance of this test case to the business goals of the product. 1=Most important.

fields.name: Steps
fields.description: Steps required to perform the test

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test; requirement tested

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this test case is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this bug will be fixed

fields.name: Automated Test Name
fields.description: The name of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Storage
fields.description: The assembly containing the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Automated Test Id
fields.description: The ID of the test that automates this test case

fields.description: The type of the test that automates this test case

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this test plan will execute.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test plan.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test plan.

fields.name: State
fields.description: Workflow status.  Active = tests in this test plan must be run; Inactive = tests in this test plan no longer need to be run

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: Reason for the current test plan state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this test plan.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test plan

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The start date to run the tests in this test plan.

fields.name: Finish Date
fields.description: The completion date for running all the tests in this test plan.

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build on which the test plan was executed

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration for this test suite.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test suite.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test suite.

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test suite.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why  the current test suite is in the current state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently assigned to the test suite.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test suite

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build on which the test suite was executed

fields.name: Test Suite Type
fields.description: Specifies the category of the test suite.

fields.name: Test Suite Audit
fields.description: Captures the test suite audit trail.

workItemTypes.name: Bug
workItemTypes.description: Describes a divergence between required and actual behavior, and tracks the work done to correct the defect and verify the correction.

workItemTypes.name: Epic
workItemTypes.description: Epics help teams effectively manage and groom their product backlog

workItemTypes.name: Feature
workItemTypes.description: Tracks a feature that will be released with the product

workItemTypes.name: Task
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the task through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle.

workItemTypes.name: Issue
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track changes through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle.

workItemTypes.name: Change Request
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track changes through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle

workItemTypes.name: Risk
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the work to mitigate a risk.

workItemTypes.name: Requirement
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the requirement through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle

workItemTypes.name: Review
workItemTypes.description: This work item tracks reviews and the results.

workItemTypes.name: Test Case
workItemTypes.description: Server-side data for a set of steps to be tested.

workItemTypes.name: Test Plan
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activities for a specific milestone or release.

workItemTypes.name: Test Suite
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activites for a specific feature, requirement, or user story.

actions.value: Complete and Does Not Require Review/Test
Code Complete and System Test Passed
Tests in this test suite are now active and can be run
Removed from planning and test execution
Plan test cases for this test suite
Completed testing for this test suite

behaviors.description: Enables work items to be ordered relative to other work items
behaviors.name: Ordered
